components.name: Button
components.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and styles

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render inside the button

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the button take up 100% width of its container

props.name: small
props.description: Renders a smaller version of the button (24px height vs 32px)

props.name: dropdown
props.description: Adds a dropdown chevron icon to the button

props.name: variant
props.description: Button style variant - primary (filled), secondary (outlined), or flat (text)

props.name: openModal
props.description: ID of the modal to open when the button is clicked

props.name: onclick
props.description: Function to call when the button is clicked

components.name: Input
components.description: Form input component for text entry

props.name: inputType
props.description: HTML input type (text, password, email, etc.)

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the input

props.name: value
props.description: Current value of the input, can be bound with bind:value

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the input

props.name: error
props.description: Error message displayed below the input when validation fails

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the input

props.name: small
props.description: Renders a smaller version of the input

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the input take up 100% width of its container

props.name: onchange
props.description: Function called when input value changes and loses focus

props.name: oninput
props.description: Function called on every keystroke/input change

props.name: onfocus
props.description: Function called when input gains focus

props.name: onblur
props.description: Function called when input loses focus

components.name: Select
components.description: Dropdown select component for choosing from options

props.name: options
props.default: [{ value: 'option1', label: 'Option 1' }, { value: 'option2', label: 'Option 2' }, { value: 'option3', label: 'Option 3' }]
props.description: Array of option objects with value and label properties

props.name: value
props.description: Currently selected value, can be bound with bind:value

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the select

props.name: error
props.description: Error message displayed below the select when validation fails

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the select dropdown

props.name: small
props.description: Renders a smaller version of the select

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the select take up 100% width of its container

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Text displayed when no option is selected

props.name: onchange
props.description: Function called when selection changes

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the textarea

props.name: value
props.description: Current text value, can be bound with bind:value

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the textarea

props.name: error
props.description: Error message displayed below the textarea when validation fails

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the textarea

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of visible text rows

props.name: maxlength
props.description: Maximum character count; displays counter when set

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the textarea take up 100% width of its container

props.name: onchange
props.description: Function called when textarea value changes and loses focus

props.name: oninput
props.description: Function called on every keystroke/input change

props.name: onfocus
props.description: Function called when textarea gains focus

props.name: onblur
props.description: Function called when textarea loses focus

components.name: TagBuilder
components.description: Interactive component for creating and managing tags

props.name: tags
props.description: Array of tag objects with id and text properties

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the tag builder

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the input field

props.name: error
props.description: Error message displayed below the tag builder

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the tag builder

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the tag builder take up 100% width of its container

props.name: maxTags
props.description: Maximum number of tags allowed; displays counter when set

props.name: onchange
props.description: Function called when tags are added or removed

components.name: Slider
components.description: Range slider for selecting numeric values

props.name: min
props.description: Minimum value of the slider range

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum value of the slider range

props.name: step
props.description: Step size for value increments

props.name: value
props.description: Current value for single handle mode

props.name: startValue
props.description: Lower bound value for dual handle mode

props.name: endValue
props.description: Upper bound value for dual handle mode

props.name: dual
props.description: Enables dual handle mode for selecting a range

props.name: label
props.description: Label text displayed above the slider

props.name: valueLabel
props.description: Label for the displayed value

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables the slider

props.name: stretch
props.description: Makes the slider take up 100% width of its container

props.name: showOutput
props.description: Shows the current value(s) next to the slider

props.name: formatFn
props.description: Function to format the displayed value

props.name: onchange
props.description: Function called when slider value changes after drag ends

props.name: oninput
props.description: Function called continuously during slider drag

components.name: Avatar
components.description: Profile or team avatar component with initials and image support

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the avatar - small: 24px, medium: 32px, large: 48px

props.name: team
props.description: When true, avatar has rounded corners (4px small, 8px medium, 12px large); when false, avatar is circular

props.name: initial
props.description: Single letter or two initials to display when no image is provided

props.name: image
props.description: URL to an image to display

props.name: name
props.description: Full name for accessibility and automatic initial generation

props.name: color
props.description: Color name from design system to use as background

props.name: bgcolor
props.description: Custom background color (overrides color prop)

props.name: textcolor
props.description: Custom text color for the initials

props.name: avatarNum
props.description: Number between 1-20 for placeholder avatars from pravatar.cc

components.name: Modal
components.description: Dialog component for displaying content that requires attention

props.name: id
props.description: Unique ID for the modal, used with Button's openModal prop

props.name: title
props.description: Title text displayed in the modal header

props.name: size
props.description: Size of the modal - small: 400px, medium: 600px, large: 800px max width

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render inside the modal body

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render inside the navigation component

components.name: Safari
components.description: Component that mimics Safari browser chrome for prototypes

props.name: children
props.description: Content to render inside the Safari browser frame

props.name: url
props.description: URL to display in the address bar

components.name: Autolayout
components.description: Flexible layout component with configurable spacing and direction

props.name: children
props.description: Content to arrange within the layout

props.name: direction
props.description: Direction of the layout - horizontal (row) or vertical (column)

props.name: gap
props.description: Space between child elements in pixels

props.name: align
props.description: Alignment of items perpendicular to the main axis

props.name: justify
props.description: Distribution of items along the main axis
